Header: Anniversary Commemorations Culminate with Formal All Rank Dinner
Content: Bringing the 70th Army Anniversary commemorative events to culmination, a representative gathering of All Ranks in the Army on Friday (11) evening sat with their Commander of the Army, Lieutenant General Shavendra Silva at Panagoda Army Indoor Stadium for a formal dinner in the company of several Senior Officers. Soon after Lieutenant General Shavendra Silvaâ€™s arrival as the Chief Guest for the occasion, the proceedings began. Coloured with aesthetic dancing features, the evening provided entertainment to all the attendees during this special but customary feature of the organization.
